sourcing.instructions:
B: Obtain from a chemical supplier or online store specializing in boron compounds. 
 In: Source from chemical suppliers or specialty metal vendors. 
 O: Purchase pure oxygen from a gas supplier. 
 Sr: Get strontium from chemical supply companies. 
 Y: Find yttrium at a specialty metals or chemical supply store.
